thread.title: BRIEF-Universal Display Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.69

title: BRIEF-Universal Display Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.69
text: 27 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Universal Display Corp Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.69 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Universal Display Corp: * ORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 55 PERCENT TO $115.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.93 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $350 MILLION TO $380 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.85, REVENUE VIEW $100.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $398.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
